full_text:
IN THE COURT OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF THE FIRST CLASS- IIT
THIRUVANANTHAPURAM
Present: Sri. Vinod Babu M.U
Judicial Magistrate of the First Class-III
Thursday 20" day of February, 2024
CCG. 331/2024
Complainant : State represented by the Sub Inspector of Police, Cantonment
Police Station ( Crime 308/24).
(By Asst. Public Prosecutor)
Accused 1 : Vijesh J, aged 31 years, S/o S. Jayakumar, Flat No.310,
Rajaji Nagar., GPO, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, PIN -
695001.
2 : Jayakumar.S, aged 52 years, S/o Sivaraja Paniker, Flat No.
408, Rajaji Nagar, Pulimoodu GPO, Thiruvananthapuram,
Kerala, PIN — 695001.
3: Mahesh.J, aged 29 years, S/o Jayakumar, TC 28/310, House
No. 339, Rajaji Nagar, Thiruvananthapuram GPO, Kerala,
PIN-695001.
4 : Devadas T, aged 55 years,S/o Thankamani, TC 28/2683,
Rajaji Nagar, near Gov. Model School, Thiruvananthapuram
GPO, Kerala, PIN- 695001.
5 : Aneesh D, aged 25 years, S/o Devadas T, TC 28/2683, Rajaji
Nagar, near Gov. Model School, Thiruvananthapuram GPO,
Kerala, PIN- 695001.
(By Adv. Sri. Vysakhan J.P)
Offences : U/Ss. 294(b), 341,323,324,506 and 34 of Indian Penal Code.
Heard, perused the records and passed the following:
ORDER
1. This case has been arisen on a final report filed by the Sub Inspector of Police,
Cantonment Police Station in crime No. 308/24 alleging the commission of offences
against the accused under sections 294(b), 341,323,324,506 and 34 of Indian Penal

2
Code.

2. Accused represented. The order of the Hon’ble High Court of Kerala in Crl.
M.C No. 9089/2024 dated 04.12.2024 is received. Perused the case records. It is
seen that all further proceedings against the accused in CC. 331/2024 on the
files of this case stand quashed by the Hon’ble High Court of Kerala. Hence, the
case against the accused stand closed.

(Dictated to the Confidential Assistant, transcribed and typed by her, corrected and
pronounced by me, in open court, on this the 20" day of February, 2025.)

Judicial Magistrate of the First Class- ITI

Thiruvananthapuram
